item.description:
Concepts for Adaptive Learning will hold its fifth annual fundraiser at 6 p.m., at Anthony?s Ocean View, 450 Lighthouse Road, New Haven.



Scrumptious Food, Great Wines, and Smooth Sounds! Please join us and sample over 85 wines from over 25 premium Domestic & Imported Wineries, procured in conjunction with GRAND VIN Fine Wine & Spirits, while you listen to the smooth sounds of ?Cookie? Thomas.



New for this year is the addition of an online auction that begins on May 1 and closes on May 18. You can view or bid on great merchandise worth over $12,000 in value by going to www.eachchildlearns.cmarket.com.




Ticket donation price is $45.00 prior to the event and $50.00 at the door, which includes the best of Anthony?s hot and cold Hors D?oeuvres.




Donations will benefit a program that helps increase the educational outcomes of public school children in the New Haven community, by increasing parents? involvement in their children?s education.




For more information, please call 203-410-3679 or write to:




Curtis-Hill@cox.net




More Info: Concepts for Adaptive Learning

RESERVE YOUR TICKETS NOW!

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Wine Tasting/FundRaiser at Anthony's Ocean View in New Haven
